1581933903_14dsVvztuXjBxWmk4s4HjUnxuN4Ae.body: I think computer video games are a great way to sharpen mind. They have been there for a very long time and I was myself once a gamer. My favourite COD4 & DOOM... :)

> [ranshit](#comment_103_17XPGJDqy3F7zfV3sa4aMJF2Mhpati6N12): For a society that seems to express little control concerning their own downfall and extensive suffering, would give me reason to pause before granting a label of having a  'sharpened mind'.

Would you prefer if the downfall as well as suffering was ended after completion though? I want the conversation to be out of an infinite frame at least.
